revised_title: Investigating Attraction and Adhesion Phenomena in Solid Bodies, Films, Vesicles, and Blood Corpuscles
tldr: The author examines various phenomena of attraction and adhesion in solid bodies, films, vesicles, and blood corpuscles, demonstrating that these effects are not limited to floating bodies and can occur in completely submerged objects. The study also highlights the plasticity of blood corpuscles and their ability to form different shapes and arrangements under different conditions.
